snippet: Andy Zhang, a 14-year-old Floridian of Chinese descent, will take Paul Casey's place, making him the youngest competitor in the Open since World War II, according to the U.S.G.A.
abstract: Andy Zhang, a 14-year-old Floridian of Chinese descent, will take Paul Casey's place, making him the youngest competitor in the Open since World War II, according to the U.S.G.A.

headline.main: Casey's Withdrawal Opens Door for 14-Year-Old Competitor
